scenes.background: Monica sighs and glances at you.
scenes.description: I just hope everyone is happy with the final decision.

options.text: It's impossible to please everyone, but we can aim for a compromise.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the challenge of pleasing everyone and suggested a compromise, showing good perception and empathy but moderate social skills and self-regulation.

options.text: I'm sure we can find a way to make it work for most of us.
options.analysis: You expressed optimism and confidence, showing good self-regulation and social skills but moderate empathy and perception.

options.text: If people are too stubborn, it might be impossible to find a solution.
options.analysis: You pointed out a potential difficulty in reaching a consensus, showing good perception and motivation but lower social skills.
